data.title: Annie Awards 2012: Complete List of Winners
data.meta_description: FILM CATEGORIES Best Animated Feature "Brave" – Pixar Animation Studios "Frankenweenie" – The Walt Disney Studios "Hotel Transylvania" – Sony Picture…
data.text:
FILM CATEGORIES

Best Animated Feature

"Brave" – Pixar Animation Studios

"Frankenweenie" – The Walt Disney Studios

"Hotel Transylvania" – Sony Pictures Animation

"ParaNorman" – Focus Features

"Rise of the Guardians" – DreamWorks Animation

"The Pirates! Band of Misfits" – Aardman Animations

"The Rabbi’s Cat" – GKIDS

X — "Wreck-It Ralph" – Walt Disney Animation Studios

Directing in a Feature Production

Genndy Tartakovsky, "Hotel Transylvania" – Sony Pictures Animation

Joann Sfar, Antoine Delesvaux, "The Rabbi’s Cat" – GKIDS

Remi Bezancon, Jean-Christophe Lie, "Zarafa" – GKIDS

X — Rich Moore, "Wreck-It Ralph" – Walt Disney Animation Studios

TV/VIDEO CATEGORIES

"South Park," "Raising the Bar" – Central Productions
